short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A random entry from John Perry Barlow's '25 Principles of Adult Behavior'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill every new Chrome tab with a random entry from John Perry Barlow's '25 Principles of Adult Behavior' over a randomly selected background color. That's it. Hopefully it helps you live a happier life.
